action.action-desc: Mr. Neguse introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To require responsiveness testing of Defense Logistics Agency pharmaceutical contracts.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Further Strengthening Supply Chains for Servicemembers and Security Act of 2023.

section.header: Responsiveness testing of Defense Logistics Agency pharmaceutical contracts
section.text: The Director of the Defense Logistics Agency shall modify Defense Logistics Agency Instructions 5025.03 and 3110.01—

paragraph.text: to require Defense Logistics Agency Troop Support to coordinate annually with customers in the military departments to conduct responsiveness testing of the Defense Logistics Agency’s contingency contracts for pharmaceuticals; and
to include the results of that testing, as reported by customers in the military departments, in the annual reports of the Warstopper Program.
